description.value: The Character gains either one of the following Traits: Regeneration, Sonar Sense, or Sturdy, or one of the following mutations: Brute, Clawed/Fanged, Feels No Pain, Nightstrider, Tough Hide, or Venomous. These Mutations come about through deliberate genetic manipulation, so are not Warp-Caused Mutations that some would have issue with. This Talent can be taken multiple times, choosing a different Mutation/Trait each time.

system.benefit: The Character gains either one of the following Traits: Regeneration, Sonar Sense, or Sturdy, or one of the following mutations: Brute, Clawed/Fanged, Feels No Pain, Nightstrider, Tough Hide, or Venomous. These Mutations come about through deliberate genetic manipulation, so are not Warp-Caused Mutations that some would have issue with. This Talent can be taken multiple times, choosing a different Mutation/Trait each time.
